message.content:
cs.NI, cs.IT, cs.DC, cs.SY, cs.DS 

Reasoning: 
1. cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture) - The paper proposes a network coding-based scheme to improve the energy efficiency of distributed storage systems in wireless sensor networks. This involves designing a method for effective distributed storage technology in WSNs, which falls under the scope of networking and internet architecture. 
2. cs.IT (Information Theory) - The paper proposes a sparse generator matrix to construct network codes, which is proven to be the sparsest. This involves designing a method for efficient coding, which falls under the scope of information theory. 
3. cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing) - The paper addresses the problem of repairing data in failed storage nodes with less resource, which involves designing a distributed computing method. 
4. cs.SY (Systems and Control) - The paper proposes a method to balance energy consumption of the networks, which involves designing a control system. 
5. cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms) - The paper proposes a network coding-based iterative repair method, which involves designing an algorithm for repairing data in failed storage nodes.
